meanings.sent1: After the game, we need to restack the cards neatly.
meanings.sent2: I will restack the books on the shelf to make more space.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel tried to restack the acorns but kept dropping them.
meanings.sent4: She had to restack her priorities after the unexpected news.
meanings.sent5: Please restack the chairs in a straight line for the meeting.

meanings.sent1: The restack of the boxes made the storage room look tidier.
meanings.sent2: We did a quick restack of the plates before the party started.
meanings.sent3: The restack of the books on the table amused the children.
meanings.sent4: The restack of the files on the desk was like a puzzle to solve.
meanings.sent5: The restack of the logs created a new pattern in the fireplace.
